settings.title: Shipping information
settings.content:
At Lucellia, we are dedicated to crafting each piece to the highest standards, ensuring it meets both our quality benchmarks and your expectations. Below is an outline of our production and delivery timelines:

Custom-made pieces are crafted within approximately 12 days. Each design undergoes our quality checks to ensure it matches the signature craftsmanship and elegance Lucellia is known for.

Ready-Made Pieces are prepared and packaged within 5 business days.

Once your order is dispatched, delivery typically ranges between 3 to 15 business days, depending on your location. For rural or remote areas, please allow for potential additional transit time. Our logistics partners are carefully selected to ensure that your order arrives securely and promptly.

We value the trust you place in us and strive to make your purchasing experience seamless and enjoyable.

If you have any queries or require assistance, our customer service team is always available to assist.

Thank you for choosing Lucellia

settings.testimonial: I was hesitant about ordering a custom diamond ring online, but the whole process was reassuring. The communication was excellent, with regular updates on the design and progress. When the ring arrived, it was even more beautiful in person, and the quality was exactly as described
settings.author: Dawn S.

settings.testimonial: I’m really happy with my tennis bracelet. It’s lightweight, comfortable to wear, and looks great with everything. Definitely a good purchase.
settings.author: Liam P.

settings.testimonial: Love my custom diamond ring! The diamond sparkles beautifully, and the band is sleek with a nice fit. It’s exactly what I wanted
settings.author: Grace I.

settings.testimonial: I wasn't sure about buying online as I've been scammed before, but liked the look of the cuban bracelet so I got it. It's actually really nice. Feels great and I can wear it casually or formally.
settings.author: Kyle H.

settings.testimonial: The team was so accommodating with my design changes and kept me updated throughout the process. When it arrived, I was blown away. It's just perfect!! 10/10 recommend
settings.author: Leah M.

settings.testimonial: I recently bought a ring for my wife’s birthday, and it was perfect. The quality is exceptional, and the design is unlike anything I’ve seen before. She was completely surprised, and it made her day. I’ll definitely be a returning customer.
settings.author: Toby B.

settings.testimonial: I’ve been wearing this bracelet daily for about 4 months now. It’s comfortable and hasn’t shown any signs of wear or tarnish. Definitely worth the money.
settings.author: Trish C.

settings.testimonial: I ordered a custom bracelet and ran into a small issue with the clasp. I reached out to Lucellia and was pleasantly surprised by how quickly they fixed it—no extra cost at all. Now my bracelet is perfect, and I couldn’t be happier with both the product and the service.
settings.author: Hayley G.

settings.testimonial: I wanted something very unique as a valentines gift for my partner. The team at Lucellia put together a pink heart-shaped diamond ring and my partner absolutely loves it - extremely happy overall with the design, the updates, and the overall ease of ordering online.
settings.author: Chris S.
